title: Maharani Emerald Diamond Haaram - A Regal Cascade of Timeless Elegance
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features meticulously set
natural emeralds. Emeralds are of Zambian origin with excellent clarity and color saturation.
features: This magnificent haaram showcases a central, intricately designed pendant with floral motifs meticulously encrusted with diamonds. The pendant features a prominent square-cut emerald at its center, surrounded by smaller emerald drops. The multi-strand design incorporates four delicate strands of shimmering diamonds, culminating in emerald accents near the clasp. The filigree work exudes a sense of vintage charm and intricate craftsmanship.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with striking emerald green accents. This classic South Indian color combination symbolizes prosperity and growth.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (kalyanam)

and other celebratory events. An exquisite piece for brides during their muhurtham ceremony or for family members attending a significant milestone event. Also suitable for high-end formal gatherings and cultural events.
description: This haaram is a testament to the timeless beauty of South Indian jewelry. The use of high-quality materials and exquisite craftsmanship ensures a piece of lasting value. The design blends traditional motifs with a contemporary sensibility, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The emeralds symbolize prosperity and new beginnings, making this haaram a meaningful and cherished heirloom.
